title: US stocks trending downward as investors await Apple, Microsoft, Alphabet results
text: U.S. equity futures are trading lower ahead of the Tuesday trading session on Wall Street, a day when three tech titans – Apple, Microsoft, and Google parent Alphabet – will post quarterly results after the closing bell.

title: 5 Pandemic Earnings All-Stars to Watch
text: These 5 companies haven't missed during the pandemic and have spectacular earnings charts.

title: Options Traders Bet On Bullish Reaction To Microsoft Earnings
text: Microsoft Corp (NASDAQ: MSFT) made a new all-time high on Friday and on Monday entered into consolidation. The tech giant is set to print its fourth-quarter 2021 earnings after market close on Tuesday and three analysts are bullish going into the event.

title: Microsoft Focuses Aggressively On Cloud Ahead Of Fiscal Q4 Earnings Report
text: Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT) shook the heavens of commerce and capital when it shattered the $2 trillion market cap barrier last month. The software giant is now one of only two companies in the world—the other being Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL)—to boast a $2 trillion market cap, and one of only five companies across the globe, the other three being Saudi Aramco, Amazon (NASDAQ: AMZN), and Alphabet (NASDAQ: GOOG), to be part of the trillionaire club.

title: Microsoft (MSFT) Option Traders Optimistic Going Into Earnings
text: Trading volumes indicate that traders have been selling puts and buying calls in anticipation of an favorable earnings report.

title: Dow Jones Breaks 35,100 With Apple, Visa, Microsoft Earnings Coming
text: A third of the Dow Jones Industrial's companies are set to report earnings this week, including two tech heavyweights and a global payments giant.

title: Microsoft earnings preview: Cloud growth promises to deliver another big quarter for tech giant
text: Is Microsoft's cloud growth a temporary blip, driven by the fleeting circumstances of the pandemic, or an enduring trend reflecting a larger change in customer mindset?

title: Microsoft Earnings: What to Look For
text: Microsoft (MSFT) reports Q4 earnings after market close on July 27. Can it continue to grow Microsoft Azure revenue at a robust pace?

title: Big Tech's Earnings Results in Focus
text: Big Tech's Earnings Results in Focus.

title: 6 ETFs in the Spotlight Ahead of Big Tech Q2 Earnings
text: Total Q2 earnings from the group of five tech titans are expected to be up 48.4% on revenue growth of 29.2%.

title: Big 5 Tech Stocks Now Account for 23% of the S&P 500
text: Rarely has the benchmark market index been so top-heavy.

title: Microsoft (MSFT) to Post Q4 Earnings: Azure & Teams in Focus
text: Microsoft's (MSFT) fiscal fourth-quarter results are expected to reflect momentum in the Azure cloud platform and Teams user growth due to the continuation of remote work.

title: Q2 Earnings, Economic Data to Make for Eventful Week
text: This week brings us not the most amount of new earnings reports overall, but some of the biggest companies in the world will be reporting.

title: Earnings Previews: Microsoft, Alphabet, AMD
text: The five largest U.S. traded companies report June quarter earnings this week beginning Monday evening with Tesla.

title: Microsoft tipped for bumper quarter as cloud adoption accelerates
text: Microsoft Corporation recently became only the second company (after Apple) to be valued at more than US$2trn and analysts expect the tech titan to underline its status with bumper June results. Driving its growth is its Azure cloud business and results tomorrow are expected to reveal another huge performance from the division.

title: AI Stock Lacks a Catalyst For Liftoff
text: C3.ai posted few headlines that imply strong revenue growth ahead, sending AI stock nowhere and analysts with mixed opinions. The post AI Stock Lacks a Catalyst For Liftoff appeared first on InvestorPlace.
